document_data.mainbody:
ombie juice was a foul-tasting disgusting concoction that went down hard but made everything else less painful in comparison.
However unpalatable these drinks were, they increased imbibers resistance to all harm, mundane and magical.
In the mid-to-late-15 century DR, these horrific drinks became available during the extended celebration of Liars Night, extended into grand Masquerade of Liars by the order of Lord Neverember.
